name: Downfall (itch) (The Evil Cult)
description:
Downfall is an adventure game where you explore a cyberpunk inspired city after receiving a troubling phone call from a friend.

Sadly, we didn't get the time to do what we set out to do. The game has only a small portion of the content we were hoping for, but it is still interesting nonetheless. Thanks for taking the time to play and rate!

This game is controlled entirely via the left mouse button in a point-and-click style.

Please note that audio doesn't seem to work under Firefox for some reason (they may not support the .ogg format used). The game has been tested and works fine on the latest version of Chrome under Windows 7.
